title: I Am Legend By Richard Matheson
description:
Robert Neville may well be the only survivor of an incurable plague that has turned every other man, woman and child into unquenchable, carnivorous mutants--The Infected--who are determined to destroy him.

By day, he scavenges for food and supplies, desperate to find any other survivors who might be out there.  But all the while the infected lurk in the shadows, watching his every move, waiting for him to make a mistake.

Now a major motion picture starring Will Smith.

Audio Book narrated by Robertson Dean.

R5BY5
